about_the_game:
Welcome to Global Conflict!

Welcome to Global Conflict, the ultimate card game where nations must work together as mega factions to survive! Test your strategic knowledge in this fast-paced turn-based card game! The world is ending and governments are struggling to maintain order. Will you rise to power and become the leader of the next global mega faction?


  • Build your collection by competing in three different game modes
  • Create your own custom decks to match your play style
  • Base game includes 50 unique cards
  • Future expansion sets are planned to expand the game


  • Battle against various different AI opponents, each with their own decks and play styles
  • Compete in three different game modes (Conquest, Campaign, Free Play)
  • Use custom 60 card decks to wage war against your opponents
  • Multiple ways battle and win


  • Conquest mode (Arcade Style Ladder Mode) - Battle against 10 random opponents. Finish the ladder without losing to win special promo cards
  • Campaign mode - Choose your faction and battle for global domination. Earn cards and build your card collection
  • Free Play mode - Choose your deck, opponent, and battlefield then go to battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 on PC; AMD Radeon Vega 8
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6300
  • Processor: ntel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: BUILD, BATTLE, and CONQUER your way to victory in Global Conflict - The Trading Card Game! Assemble decks with strategic precision and engage in fierce turn-based battles against rival factions. Each move and decision will shape the course of the game, offering endless challenges and triumphs.
